post:
At Domainsatcost.com we offer a variety of hosting solutions such as: Shared hosting, VPS hosting, eCommerce hosting, WordPress hosting, Email hosting, Dedicated Servers, Domain Registrations and SSL Certificates.

We've been in business since 2006 offering affordable and reliable web hosting solutions with our in house Datacenter located in New Jersey, USA.

OpenVZ Starter
2 CPU Cores  
RAM - 768 MB  
Disk Space - 30 GB  
Bandwidth - 1000 GB  
Port speed - 100 Mbit  
Monthly price - $5/m (no contract necessary)

We also work with customized solutions.

Our VPS plans include:

24x7 Live Support 99.99% Uptime Guarantee  
Full Root/Administrator Access  
Latest Linux Control Panels  
Free Migration / IPv6 available  
Secure, isolated containers with 100mbit link  

For further information visit: [http://domainsatcost.com/](http://domainsatcost.com/)
